text: Khurto Hajji Ismail or Babe Şêx (1933 – 1 October 2020, ) was the religious leader of the Yazidi community of Iraq. He held this position from 2007 to 2020. He lived in Ain Sifni, Iraq. He died on 1 October 2020 in a hospital in Erbil from heart and kidney failure, aged 87. ==References== Category:Iraqi people Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Yazidis
title: Khurto Hajji Ismail
